footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Tighnari | Update Date: 09/09/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Hunter’s Path__
Tighnari’s signature weapon and his Best-in-Slot when opting to focus on his personal damage. Do note that an EM sands is more preferred over an ATK% sands as it synergies well with the weapon passive.

__Elegy for the End__
Very capable weapon on Tighnari — especially in scenarios where he requires relatively high Energy Recharge to burst consistently — since the buffs supplied is actually significant on him. Moreover, the buff provided by the weapon’s passive also strengthens teammates, conferring more value to the weapon.
** **

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Prototype Crescent, The Stringless, Slingshot__
Satisfactory weapons that all perform well on Tighnari.
The Stringless is better in situations where he does not utilize his charged shots while Prototype Crescent and Slingshot are better when charged shotting, albeit with conditional passives that want to be proc’d and/ or maintained.
** **

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
__4 Gilded Dreams, 4 Wanderer’s Troupe__
When charge shotting on Tighnari, Gilded Dreams and Wanders Troupe perform neaely identical to one another. Thus, it is recommended to run the 4 set with better substats.
** **

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% OR Elemental Mastery |<goblet> Dendro DMG Bonus|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Khanda Barrier-Buster
**2)** Elemental Burst: Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft
**3)** Elemental Skill: Vijnana-Phala Mine

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
ATK% sands is still the preferred mainstat over Elemental Mastery unless using his Signature weapon or very low base attack weapons.

ER requirements differ based on the situation Tighnari is placed in, his team, and how many skills are used per burst cycle. Generally, his ER requirements are:
Solo Dendro, 1 Skill/ Burst — 160-180+ ER
Double Dendro, 1 Skill/ Burst — 120-140+ ER
Solo Dendro, 2 Skills/ Burst — 100 ER
